  - Build tool: npm

  - All core files configured: vite.config.ts, tsconfig.json, package.json, index.html, src files

- [ ] Customize the Project

- [ ] Install Required Extensions

- [ ] Compile the Project
  - Pending: Requires Node.js installation to run `npm install`

- [ ] Create and Run Task
  - Pending: After npm dependencies are installed

  - Pending: After npm dependencies are installed
